title: Anyone else having Bluetooth issue since last system update on my Pixel 2XL
content:
My Pixel 2xl had a system update 2 weeks ago. Since that update my Pixel Buds (the original ones with the string) will not stay connected. I have to resync them each time and they only stay connected for a few minutes. 

Additional, my Samsung gear2 seems to be drain battery when connected to the Pixel 2XL. I did not have these issues before the last update.

Any help would be great
